description: The [GoldMax](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0588) Linux variant has used a crontab entry with a @reboot line to gain persistence.(Citation: CrowdStrike StellarParticle January 2022)

external_references.description: CrowdStrike. (2022, January 27). Early Bird Catches the Wormhole: Observations from the StellarParticle Campaign. Retrieved February 7, 2022.
